data.name: Wood & Weather
data.detailed_description:
Wood & Weather is a silly god-game game all about pizza. Do your best to fulfill pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your shop open in this fun pizza game. Find new toppings, craft new recipes and upgrade equipment to create your pizza empire! üçïüçïüçï

Key features:

  • Pizza! New customizable recipes and dozens of fresh ingredients will allow you to make the best, most authentic pizza!
  • New career mode based on a brand-new quest system and new mechanics for accepting flexible orders.
  • Sandbox mode with Day/Night cycle.
  • Cozy wooden pizzeria. New scenery featuring 5 biomes
data.about_the_game:
Wood & Weather is a silly god-game game all about pizza. Do your best to fulfill pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your shop open in this fun pizza game. Find new toppings, craft new recipes and upgrade equipment to create your pizza empire! üçïüçïüçï

Key features:

  • Pizza! New customizable recipes and dozens of fresh ingredients will allow you to make the best, most authentic pizza!
  • New career mode based on a brand-new quest system and new mechanics for accepting flexible orders.
  • Sandbox mode with Day/Night cycle.
  • Cozy wooden pizzeria. New scenery featuring 5 biomes
data.short_description: Wood & Weather is a silly god-game game about pizza- but we've just been told the developers have pivoted the game to be about climate change instead.
data.reviews:
‚ÄúAussie developer Paper House will track its environmental impact going forward‚Äù

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit and greater
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller Recommended

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
